parts.detailText: Simply enter your information via the Quickstart and immediately embed the form on your website. Free of charge and in 10 minutes.
Take appointments around the clock without having to make phone calls. With Bookingflix you and your customers save time when making appointments.
Increase your appointment reliability with automated appointment reminders via SMS to your customers....
Book appointments at any time and from anywhere - even via smartphone. Make it easy for your customers to get in touch with you.
Multiple daily storage of appointment and customer data on separate servers, HTTPS encryption and DSGVO compliant. Your data is safe with us!
